column1: Local Foods////While Local Foods didn't "blow my mind" like other reviewers raved
column2: its still pretty awesome. The atmosphere is quite trendy(including the mass amount of hipsters and their beards)
column4: and the portions definitely weren't lacking. I would try it out if you haven't. Also
column5: I'd try not to go during peak hours because the line was out the door when i went @12:30.
